meanings.definition: A process of applying lacquer to a surface to create a durable finish.
meanings.sent1: The lacquering of the table made it shiny and protected.
meanings.sent2: I watched the lacquering of the wooden chair to make it last longer.
meanings.sent3: The lacquering of the old dresser turned it into a glossy masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her skillful lacquering transformed the plain box into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The lacquering process gave the furniture a smooth and glossy appearance.

meanings.definition: The act of coating something with lacquer.
meanings.sent1: After the lacquering, the surface was smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: He performed the lacquering carefully to avoid any drips.
meanings.sent3: The lacquering of the vase made it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: The lacquering on the floor made it shine like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The lacquering process added a protective layer to the wood.

meanings.definition: The art or craft of applying lacquer to objects for decoration or protection.
meanings.sent1: Her lacquering skills were admired by all who saw her work.
meanings.sent2: The lacquering on the jewelry box enhanced its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The lacquering of the mask gave it a unique and vibrant look.
meanings.sent4: The lacquering of the frame made the painting stand out even more.
meanings.sent5: The lacquering technique she used was passed down through generations.
